1131211.content:
The run seems to last forever. With each pounding step, Rick's full weight presses down on Alan, mashing him and making him totally unrecognizable. Alan would have thought the repeated mashing of his body under Rick's giant toes would have made conscious thought all but impossible, but he found that his mind was still functioning rather well. And all he could think about as Rick's sweat drenched his mashed, formless body was: How could his own father do this to him?

Finally, Rick returned home and went straight to the living room. It was there that Rick finally removed his shoes and socks and dropped Alan into his open palm. He waited a few minutes for Alan to regain his usual (though shrunken) form, and then gave him another stern look.

"How did you like that, young man? Did that make you think twice about messing around with forces you don't even understand?"

Alan hardly even heard his father's question, though. He was in a rage. The moment Rick finished speaking, Alan was screaming his head off at him. "What's wrong with you?! What kind of father crushes his own son beneath his foot? What kind of father--"

But Rick's thunderous voice interrupted, pouring out of Rick's throat with such force that Alan was knocked onto his rear in Rick's hand. "A good father! That's what! A father with a son too stupid to realize when he's in over his head! I should leave you like that! That's what I should do! See how you like living like that for the rest of your life!"

Alan's whole body went numb and he moved forward on his hands and knees, prostrating himself in Rick's palm and begging, "No, Dad! Please! I'll be good. I'll never mess with magic again!"

"Hmmm," Rick hummed consideringly. "Maybe... But I still don't think you've learned your lesson. Maybe a night of begging at my feet... I could use a nice massage after that run..."

In his hope, Alan agreed quickly and eagerly, and Rick instantly reached down and set him between his enormous feet, propped up on the table in front of him. Alan instantly reached out and started rubbing Rick's giant soles.

"That's good, Alan, but I still don't think your heart is in it. Maybe... if you used your tongue."

At this, Alan finally gave pause. He leaned his head to the side, looking over at his father's face questioningly. Rick's face immediatly sank into a scowl and Alan knew he was absolutely serioius. He slowly licked his lips, then began licking the sweaty giant soles of Rick as Rick lounged in front of the television.

1131212.content:
As Rick steps out the front door, Alan is still screaming desperately between breaths. "No! Please, Dad, I've learned my lesson! Just let me ou--"

Alan wouldn't know whether Rick could even hear him or not as he was abruptly cut off when Rick began to jog. The combination of the up and down, flattening under Rick's toes, and how Rick's stinky foot sweat was swallowed down Alan's throat as he ran quickly caused Alan to become very sick as his father ran. He retched, vomiting up a small amount of bile containing the sweat before it mixed with the new sweat from Rick's foot and more of it found its way down Alan's throat.

Alan thought the torture would never end, but after only ten minutes or so, Rick started slowing down, allowing Alan to recover, if only slightly. A few moments later, Rick stopped all together, and Alan faintly heard a doorbell being rung. Alan could only wonder where his father had gone in the minutes before the door was answered.

Rick readjusted his weight, lifting his weight from the foor under which Alan was crushed so he could curl Alan under his toes a few times, just to sink in his punishment. Finally, the door was answered, and a man whose voice Alan didn't recognize answered.

"Rick," said the man in surprise. "I didn't expect to see you today. Come in!"

Rick greeted him as he stepped into the door. A dozen steps later found him sitting on the couch in the living room. The other man was right behind him and sat beside him on the couch. Very close. Rick started untying his shoes while the other man spoke.

"So, what are you doing here? Not that I'm not happy to see you but I thought you said you couldn't come over today," the other man said.

Rick slid off one of his shoes and then prepared to pull off the one Alan was in, as he replied, "Well, Hank, I didn't think I would get the chance, but when I got home from work today, I found something... interesting, and wanted you to see it."

With this, Rick pulled off the remaining shoe, Alan still clutched under his curled toes, and then pulled his foot up to rest on his knee. He pulled his flattened son from his foot and held him in his hand for a minute to allow him to restore to his normal shape before he held the hand out for Hank to see.

Hank's eyes widened as he saw the tiny teenager in Rick's hand. At the same time, Alan appraised his father's friend. Hank was a handsome, well-built man, apparently in his mid-twenties. Alan was pretty sure he had seen him before, though he had never met him. He had had no idea he was his father's friend, and wondered how they knew each other.

His wonder was quickly answered as he spied a certain mischevious grin being traded between the two men (their ages about as far apart as Alan's and Hank's probably were). In disbelief, Alan's eyes wandered downward, spotting their hands clasped on their laps. There was no space on the couch between them. Alan couldn't belive it: His father was having an affair with another man!

Rick smiled to himself as he saw the shocked expression on Alan's face and started to explain. "I wasn't going to tell you like this, but... Well..." He turned to Hank to include him in the explanation. "Alan, here, got himself shrunk while playing with forces he didn't understand. I should have known he'd do something like this to himself."

Alan tried to interrupt. "But, Dad, if you just get the book from my room, you should be able to turn me--"

"Shut up, boy," said Rick unkindly and went on to explain his punishment to Hank. Alan felt betrayed by his own father and stopped listening, though is ears perked up again when his father added, "So I figured, as part of his punishment, you might like to... Er... Teach him a lesson of your own."

Both the giants grinned wickedly, and Alan shuddered. He didn't bother trying to voice his own objections. He was quickly learning how useless his own voice had become since being shrunk.

"That sounds like fun," said Hank. "So, are you going to help me, or am I just going to have to think of things to do with him by myself?"

Wedged between two of his brother's toes, Alan endured an uncomfortable and unsettling journey.

He knew enough to dread Mike's intentions. Besides, his brother was an amateur with magic. Mike shouldn't be working spells. There could be some unforeseen consequence...

"Yeah," Alan thought. What could be more unforeseen than getting shrunk to a couple of inches tall and then being made into the amazing pliable man.

"At least I'm safe like this...I think," Alan thought to himself.

••••••••••

As soon as Mike began to contemplate the possibilities, he had one burning desire — to share his discovery with his best friend, Robert.

Robert and Mike enjoyed getting into all sorts of trouble...and they were certainly not above causing trouble for other people.

His brother squirmy and squishy between his toes, Alan grabbed the strange book and took off for Robert's home.

••••••••

Robert invited Mike to his bedroom as soon as his friend showed up.

"Have I got something to show you!" Mike said with glee.

Robert grinned in curiosity. He was 17, of medium height and build, with dark hair and coal black eyes.

Mike sat on the edge of Robert's bed and began to remove his shoes and socks.

"Hey, man!" Robert objected. "I don't need to see your feet, let alone smell them."

Mike ignored Robert and reached down to his foot. He plucked his brother from between his toes.

He dropped his tiny brother on Robert's bedspread.

"Man, that looks like...Is that Alan?"

"Yeah, my big bro had a little mishap," Mike explained.

"How did this happen?" Robert looked fascinated.

•••••••

Alan stared up at Mike and Robert. The two titans completely unnerved him, especially when Robert lowered his face toward him and stared intently with his dark eyes.

"Watch this!" Mike said, grabbing Alan in his hand. He began to squeeze.

"What the hell are you doing?" Robert panicked.

"Relax." Mike unfolded his hand and revealed a flattened version of his tiny brother, molded to fit the outline of Alan's palm.

As they watched, Alan began to regain his shape. When the harrowing process was complete, Alan got to his feet and began shouting at his brother.

"Enough is enough! Make me big, Mike! Now!" Alan shouted.

The two giants ignored him.

"Can I hold him?" Robert asked.

"Sure."

"No! Mike, what are you..."

Robert grabbed Alan. He didn't squeeze, though.

"This is cool. How did this happen?"

Mike produced the book. "He shrunk himself with a spell in this book," he explained to his fascinated friend. "And I made him squishy."

"Damn!" Robert exclaimed. "What else can it do?"

"I haven't had time to study it."

"Mike, you shouldn't mess with magic without knowing what you're doing," Alan squeaked.

Mike scanned through the book. "There must be hundreds of spells in here."

"What are you gonna do with him?" Robert asked, looking down at the tiny man in his hand.

"I don't know."

"Could I keep him? Just for the night?"

Mike shrugged. "Sure. But the book goes with me. I'll use the time to study all these spells."

"No! Mike!" Alan pleaded. "Don't leave me like this!"

Scott carried Alan into the living room and set him on the coffee table without speaking another word to him. He then sat down on the couch directly in front of Alan. His eyes focused on Alan and began to scan Alan's tiny body repeatedly. Alan dared not move, no matter how uncomfortable the big man's gaze made him. He had no idea what Scott's plans for him might be, and he feared the possibility of angering him in the meantime.

After about five minutes, Robert finally appeared in the doorway from the hallway. Scott didn't see him as the doorway was behind the couch, but Alan could see him cowering there as he gathered the courage to enter the living room. Robert's reaction to his father was what scared Alan the most. Somehow, Alan got the impression from the way Robert acted around his father that his father could be a potentially dangerous man. Alan just hadn't decided yet whether Scott's intention toward him in particular was good or bad.

Robert looked just about to finally push himself through the doorway when his father spoke up. "Oh, just get in here already, you little punk! Stop cowering at the door."

Robert's face drained of color, but he quickly obeyed and shuffled over to the armchair sitting to the side of the room. His eyes never dared venture too far close to his father, though Scott's raptor gaze fixed attentatively on his skulking son the moment he came into view. Scott's eyes finally released their intense hold when Robert sank into the chair, and Alan was considerably displeased to find them settled back on him.

"You called Mike?" Scott's harsh voice cut through the silence. Robert squeaked a barely audible yes. For a moment, Scott looked as though he was going to jump down his son's throat just for that, but instead, he asked another question. "He's coming?"

"Yes," squeaked Robert in the same mousy voice.

"He's bringing the book?"

Another squeaky, "Yes."

Scott growled his approval and returned the room to silence. Alan detected a scarcely audible sigh of relief coming from the direction of Robert when the questions ceased. Alan couldn't believe he was actually starting to feel pity for this teenager who had thought to use him as his own personal toy.

It was about another five minutes before the doorbell rang. Robert didn't move a muscle, afraid that any action, even to answer the door would only further upset his father, until Scott told him direcly to answer the door. A moment later, Mike skulked into the room along with Robert.

Scott eyed the ancient book in Mike's hand and indicated for him to set it on the coffee table. Mike did so and then sat in an armchair opposite of Robert. Neither, it seemed, wanted to get too close to Scott. Scott, it also seemed, noticed, and ordered them both on the couch, while he stood up to pace on the other side of the coffee table.

The two boys hunkered down nervously on the couch while Scott picked up the book and started flipping pages. His eyes frequently glanced toward Alan or the two boys, but mostly just scanned the many pages of the mystical book. He finally found what he was looking for, put a finger in the book to mark his place, and then turned his full attention back to Mike and Robert.

"So..." he began, "... you two thought you would just shrink Mike's older brother and amuse yourselves with him, did you?"

"Well, not really..." answered Mike. As he paused, Scott glared at him angrily, and he rushed the rest of his response, "I mean... Sir... H-he shrunk himself. I just found him like that."

"Is that true?" Scott said, turning his intense gaze down to Alan. In his fear, Alan could only nod his head slightly, though Scott's raptor eyes apparently picked up even that tiny movement and nodded in understanding.

His eyes turned once again to the two boys. "And just what exactly did you two plan to do with him anyway?"

Neither boy braved to answer this particular question. After a minute or so, Scott nodded again as if in confirmation of some silent response, and continued.

"Well, I think you two have in line a punishment for your actions. In fact, I think you deserve a very special punishment," said Scott, his face growing ever more dark and menacing, "A taste of your own medicine..."

For the first time, both the teenagers eyes locked on Scott. In a flourish of movement, Scott brought the book up toward his face, opened it back up to the page he had marked and began reciting the words of the shrinking spell. Neither Robert nor Mike moved from the couch. Both were apparently paralyzed in fear, and as a light, barely visible mist formed around them, they both began to shrink down to the same size as Alan.

It took only seconds before both the teenagers were teetering on the edge of the couch cushions, only inches tall. Alan across the gap between the couch and the coffee table watched in amazement, then spun back around to scream up at Scott.

"W-What about me?!" Alan shouted. "Aren't you going to turn me back?!"

Scott's head lowered so his eyes could focus back on Alan. His gaze was as evil as ever. "Why should I do that? You shrunk yourself. You chose your fate. I think if you're going to return to normal size, it should be by your own merits."

As if to cement his meaning, Scott walked over to the nearby bookshelf and slid the ancient book into a free spot on the highest shelf, near the ceiling. Alan would never be able to reach it. Scott walked back toward the couch and coffee table.

"And until you do manage to find a way to turn yourself back, I don't see why you can't join these two in whatever I decide to do with them..." As Scott finished, he scooped up the shrunken Mike and Robert in his right hand and Alan in his left.

All three were at the mercy of this frightening giant now...

At first, they both just sat there trying to hear what Scott might be doing with Robert high above them on the bed, but they quickly realized that all the outside sound was effectively muffled inside the boot.

Once that realization had sunk in, Alan's mind quickly turned back to how he had gotten into this mess in the first place. True, he had shrunk himself, but he didn't REALLY think it was going to work, and besides, how was he to know that everyone he would meet thereafter was going to enslave him and use him for their own sick purposes?

His own brother... HIS OWN BROTHER... had wasted no time stuffing him into his own shoe with his stinking foot just to torure him on his way to show him to his friend Robert, and then had just left him there, not caring one bit about what Robert might do to him then.

Alan seethed with every thought and just as he was about to start screaming his head off at his brother, the most unexpected thing happened... Mike started screaming at him instead!

"THIS IS ALL YOUR FAULT!" Mike screamed at him suddenly, taking the words right out of Alan's mouth. Alan took a moment to make sure it really was his brother who had just said it and not himself before countering.

"What?!" gasped Alan. "WHAT?! My fault! You can't be serious! How is this my fault?!"

"If you hadn't have bought that stupid book, none of this would ever have happened!" Mike spat out instantly, as if knowing exactly how Alan was going to respond before he even said anything.

Of course, he did have a point, though he certainly wasn't going to take the blame for their current circumstance.

"Well, I never knew my own brother would care so little for me that he would just take me and use me and make me his slave, instead of trying to help me!"

"It's not like I was going to hurt you! I was just having a little fun!"

"Yeah, that's all Robert's dad is trying to have with us now too!"

This one struck Mike silent for a moment, but he recovered quickly. "Yeah, well, this still wouldn't have happened if you hadn't gotten that book in the first place! It still all your fault!"

"My fault, huh?" said Alan. "And I suppose I brought MYSELF over to YOUR best friends house, gave myself to him, got caught by his father..." Alan left out that it was in fact himself who got him caught by Robert's father. "... and then actually brought the book and gave it the man who would then use it to shrink you! Face it, Mike. You have no one to blame but yourself!"

"... Well... Maybe, but if that's so... you have no one to blame but yourself either, you know..." Mike replied after a moment, sheepishly.

That ended the argument. They both had their points. It was as much either of their fault as the other. For the first time, they both started coming to terms with the fact that they really did have no one to blame but themselves.

They spent the next ten minutes in absolute silence, wondering what the other was thinking, wondering if they would spend the rest of their lives like this, and worst of all: wondering what was happening between Scott and Robert far above them on the bed.

Finally, Mike spoke again. "I'm sorry, Alan."

Alan didn't say anything.

"... you know... for treating you like..."

"A thing," Alan supplied.

"Yeah," replied Mike quietly. "I'm sorry."

Alan remained quiet again, choosing not to forgive his brother just yet. Thoughts of whether Mike would still feel this way now if he were regular-size again were too dominant in Alan's mind.

Mike didn't seem to need his brother's forgiveness, nor expect it. Instead, he continued speaking without waiting for a response from Alan. "So... Maybe we should start talking about who we're going to get out of this mess."

Alan looked up. His eyes had adjusted to the dark, and although it was pitch black in the interior of the shoe, he could just make out his brother's shape sitting across from him. For the first time, he felt an absurd sense of hope.

Before he could reply, though, the boot shook and both boys braced themselves for the movement as Scott pulled the boot back up. As he reached in and pulled out the sock, Alan and Mike both tumbled to the toe of the sock, falling on top of each other. They both just managed to look up as the sock was pulled open at the top...

The closest place would be his brother Ron's house. Several years older, Ron worked in construction. "If I get lucky, he won't even be home," Alan thought to himself.

Alan got along reasonably well with Ron, who was sort of the family renegade, always going his own way. At age 25, he was several years older than his younger brothers. He was 6 feet tall with light brown hair and an incredible body. Huge muscles. Broad shoulders. Strong legs. Powerful chest.

Alan reached his brother's place and used his key. "Ron? You at home, bro?"

When he got no answer, Alan threw himself onto a couch and began to eagerly scan pages in the book.

Before long, he found what he was looking for. "It can't be that simple, can it?" Alan asked himself.

He recited the spell.

Nothing happened. He was certain he had followed the instructions.

"Damn! I should have known. Book's worthless."

Irritated, he got up and started toward Ron's kitchen to get himself something to drink from the fridge.

He walked past Ron's washer and dryer in the hallway. There were piles of dirty laundry waiting to be washed.

Suddenly, Alan felt very strange. A nova of colors burst in his brain. He felt dizzy.

A short time later, he found himself trapped in some dark tunnel. He began to look for a way out.

A few seconds later, a tiny, naked Alan crawled out from beneath his own T-shirt. Except now the garment could have been converted into a circus tent.

"It worked!" Alan squeaked.

Then, looking around, seeing everything so huge, he repeated the words. "It worked."

He was only a few inches tall, at the most. Luckily for him his clothes shrank with him.

The giant soldiers leave him behind, retiring to their tents for the night.

A battered and weary Alan crawls out of the bootprint. Slowly, he makes his way back to the tent he left earlier.

When he arrives...
15112122.title: Will they watch their step?

choices: Alan tumbles out of the boot
Alan's in the other boot
151121221.content:
Alan, bruised and near exhaustion, crawled back beneath the flaps into the tent where he found the giant soldier, Tom Hawks, sleeping soundly.
His ordeal had left tiny Alan too weary to even think about admiring the gigantic form of the muscular soldier. He just wanted to find a safe place to spend the night.
He spied a dark cavern offered by the entrance to one of Tom's enormous boots. The boot had overturned onto its side after Tom pulled them off his feet before going to sleep.
Alan was barely able to pull himself into the leather cavern before he curled up in a tiny ball and fell into a deep slumber.
•••••
At dawn, just as the last remnants of the dark night were replaced by the early morning sun, Tom began to stir. He came fully awake when one of his buddies stuck his head into the tent.
"Time to get up, Hawks."
Tom stood and stretched. He pulled on his camouflage uniform and then reached for his boots.
"Hold it, man!" Tom's buddy cautioned. "Damn, you never stick your feet into your boots when you're in the desert without checking them first."
The other soldier grabbed the boot out of Tom's hand. "Here, shake them out first. You don't want to stick your foot in there when some scorpion or spider might have crawled in there during the night."
The soldier shook out the boot over the sandy floor beneath the tent...
151121221.title: Boot Check

choices: Tom and Larry decide what to do with Alan
Tom and Larry argue about who discovered Alan
1511212211.content:
The two soldiers saw a tiny creature drop from the boot and land roughly in the sand between their feet.

"Ya see what I mean?" said Tom's fellow soldier. "Damn bugs crawl in and spend the night."

The soldier raised his huge boot. With a grimace on his face, he prepared to obliterate the tiny intruder.

"Hey, Larry. Hold up!" Tom said. "There's something funny about that bug."

••••••

Tiny Alan, only an inch tall, received a rude awakening when the boot in which he had spent the night was violently shaken, causing him to fall out onto the ground. The impact stunned him and left him helpless on his back. He looked up and saw two huge soldiers standing over him.

Alan knew he had to contact the giants. He tried desperately to get his breath when he saw one of the huge soldiers raise a colossal boot directly over him.

"Oh god! No!" Alan screamed, throwing up his arms in front of him.

••••••

Larry frowned and paused his stomp. "One bug looks pretty much as weird as any other," he complained.

"But this one..." Tom muttered. He kneeled on the ground and lowered his mountainous body over the tiny form. "Oh fuck! It's a tiny man!"

"Impossible!" Larry crowded closer. "Let me see!"

Alan cowered as the two muscular giants stared down at him. He began to tremble when Tom's enormous fingers reached for him.
1511212211.title: Noticed

choices: In Tom's Boot with Tom's Huge Foot
In the Jar
15112122111.content:
The giant's fingers pinched together to crush Alan's tiny inch-tall body in a strong grip.

The pincher-like fingertips closed solidly around Alan's torso, leaving his tiny legs free to kick. "Stop..." Alan gurgled as he tried, and failed, to pull air into his lungs. "Your crushing me."

Just before he blacked out, giant Tom dropped the tiny stowaway onto his palm.

At first, all Alan cared about was renewing a supply of air for his starved lungs and brain. Then, he slowly became aware of the two huge faces staring at him as he sat in the center of Tom's massive palm.

"We can't be late," Larry cautioned. "The sarge will..."

"I know," Tom said. "I just need a place to keep the little runt."

Larry grinned. "Well, you were telling me your boots are about a size too big," he said. "The little runt wanted in there, so let him stay in there!"

Alan grew alert. "No!" Alan squeaked. "You can't!"

"But he could get crushed," Tom argued, not wanting to lose this new-found prize.

Larry frowned. "Well, that would be his bad luck, but he looks like he can handle it."

"You can't put me in there!" Alan said. "Not while he's wearing it!"

His little squeaks barely registered. In fact, he was not at all sure he was making himself heard by the two titans.

Larry opened his footlocker and removed an empty jar. "You could put him in here until we get back," he said. "It wouldn't be as fun..."

Tom contemplated the tiny man he held in his hand. Alan saw the workings behind those giant eyes as he tried to come to a decision...
15112122111.title: Where to Put Him

choices: Is Alan a Smear?
Alan is a Survivor...for Now
151121221111.content:
Tom decided.

He tilted his palm and traced the tiny man's slide off his hand and into the interior of his Army issue combat boot.

"Noooh!" Alan cried as he dropped deep into the boot.

When he hit bottom, Alan got to his feet and looked up. He was greeted by the hard-bitten faces of the two Army guys. Tom scowled. "If I were you, I'd haul ass to the other end of that boot, little man."

Alan shrieked as he saw Tom's huge socked foot coming into the boot. In panic, he raced toward the toe region of the building-sized boot.

Tom and Larry exchanged knowing glances. "So, can you feel the little runt in there?" Larry wanted to know.

Tom laughed. "Hell, I can't even feel him."

"He may already be a smear," Larry said. "But, if he does survive, next time, he gets to take a ride in my boot."

The two guys left their tent to get ready for a day's training maneuvers.

1512.content:
There were two cops standing beside the bench, discussing something. Both were very tall and muscular. They looked to Alan like two massive towers extending straight up into the heavens. One of them was brown-haired and looked to be in his thirties. The other one was much younger, surely just a rookie, and had short blond hair.

Alan staggered slowly out from beneath the bench, between the two giant cops, thinking about what to do. They were cops. Surely if there was anyone who would help him in his current plight, it would be them. He decided to try to get their attention.

Easier said then done, though. He was mere inches tall. Even shouting at his loudest, it didn't seem he had any hope of getting their attention. But then, he had a flash of hope. As he was screaming, the young cop with the blond hair glanced down, seemingly in response to his screaming, and though he looked back up, Alan was sure he had seen him. His rational brain had surely just rejected what he had just seen as truth.

And sure enough, a moment later, the cop looked down again, this time narrowing his eyes to see the thing on the ground between their feet better. Alan breathed a sigh of relief as the young cop's eyes widened, and he looked up at the other cop again, an alert look now on his face.

Alan was saved!

... Maybe.
1512.title: Help!

choices: Bryant wants to "play" with his new "toy" now...

15122.content:
Bryant spent the rest of the day, short and impatient with his partner in everything they did. The little man he had found beside the park bench hidden inside his pocket, Bryant reached his hand in periodically just to check he was still there. He couldn't believe it.

Something in the back of his mind had told him right away that he needed to show the little man to his partner and try to help him, but it was as if all rational thought left him when he looked at it. He felt like a kid at Christmas, who had just gotten a new toy. In fact, he felt that way in more ways then one. He couldn't shed the idea that he had just found a wonderful toy for himself that he just couldn't wait to play with.

It seemed forever before Bryant returned home to his apartment late that night. His room-mate was already asleep, and Bryant went straight to his room, closing the door behind him and kicking off his shoes. He reached a hand in his pocket and pulled out his wonderful discovery as he jumped onot the bed, bouncing a little as he got himself into a sitting position.

Alan thought he seemed quite the over-grown child as well, and he didn't know how he liked it. He couldn't deny the man was handsome, and he was somehow even attracted to him, but what kind of weird psycho world had he gotten himself into.

Bryant set Alan down between his legs on the bedspread. His feet in black socks were close behind Alan and his thick, muscular legs surrounded Alan on all sides like walls.

"What's your name?" said Bryant excitedly. Even his voice sounded childlike.

"Er... Alan," said Alan, adding, "What's yours?"

"I'm Bryant," answered Bryant, apparently very proud of his name. "Don't worry, Alan. I'm not going to hurt you. I'm here to help!"

Alan breathed a sigh of relief. The young cop really did just want to help him then. Though, Alan thought, he never should have taken him away from the park bench then. That was where the book was and how was Alan ever going to get back to normal without the book. Alan told the young cop all of this, and Bryant's smile just widened.

"Well, I would like to see this book. I guess we'll have to go back and try to find it. I hope it's still there," Bryant replied.

"Then, you're gonna help me get back to normal size?!"

Bryant's smile faltered a little. "Well... I don't know about that, my little friend. I'm gonna help you, yeah. But I don't know about normal size or not..."

Alan's hopeful expression faded to something between despair and confusion. What did this guy intend to do with him? Were they going to get the book now? What the hell was going on?!

The officer stretched his legs out before him, crossed a the ankle and rested them upon the closed book.

“Dude, whosever book that is, is not gonna be happy with all your foot stink all over it.”

“Oh yeah, well lets see how they like this” he said and began rubbing the book all over with his wet smelly socks. There was so much sweat that it left streaks on the book cover.


”Oh Gross, your nasty!” his partner commented.

Finishing up with his sweat coating he continued, “And if the owner comes back and has a problem with it, I’ll cover his with my foot sweat too”

Alan had a decision to make……
153.title: Officers

choices: The first cop puts Alan in his sock and puts it back on.
Joe puts Alan somewhere for safe-keeping...
1531.content:
Alan wasn't sure about trying to approach these officers in his current state. He at least halfway thought that the cop who had just covered the book in his foot-sweat would, just as he said, cover him in the sweat as well if he tried. Alan assured himself that he was being ridiculous, though. They were cops afterall. Their job was to help people. Right now, they just didn't know that anyone was around to hear and so were letting off steam. Surely, though, if there was anyone who could help him, Alan thought, it was the police.

Alan decided to act quickly. At his size, there was no surety that he would even be able to get the cops' attention. He saw only one opportunity. One of the cops was currently barefoot with his feet propped up on Alan's book. Alan was sure he could get the cop's attention if he could just get over and pound on the cop's foot.

So he moved. It was a short run to the book where did, in fact, meet a problem. The book was pretty thick, as tall as he was, so Alan had some difficulty pulling himself on top of it. Apart from that, the book stank of the cop's feet, and Alan had a hard time concentrating at the task at hand with that intoxicating aroma filling his nostrils. He made it, though, and ran over to the heel of one of the giant's feet. Without hesitation, Alan starting pounding on the sole while screaming his head off for help.

"What the--?" the cop said at once, and lifted his feet as he shifted forward to look down. Alan kept on shouting and flailing his arms even as the cop's feet moved away. He saw immediately that the cop was looking right at him, and in fact, noticed the other cop's eyes also focused on him. Alan couldn't keep the grin off his face as he continued yelling at the giant cops. He was sure he was saved.

"Is that--?" the second cop muttered.

"A little man," the first cop finished for him. His hand was already reaching unconsciously down, and he grasped the tiny man between his fingers. Alan immediately stopped yelling and moving his arms, but he could feel his entire body shaking with anticipation.

"I don't believe it," said the second cop, and Alan saw his eyes wander back down to the book, "Hey... That book... The title on the front..."

The second cop was already picking the book back up and paging though it. "He must have shrunk himself with this," the second cop finally finished.

"No way," said the first cop, nearly dropping Alan in his excitement, grabbing the book out of his partner's hands. He started looking through it thouroughly and allowed his partner to take the shrunken Alan out of his hand. "Do you have any idea what we could do with this, Joe?"

"What?" the cop apparently named Joe asked.

The first cop looked up, a grin forming on his lips. "Whatever we want... Whenever a civilian gets on our nerves, or we run across another punk-ass kid driving drunk at night, or... This is like something I've only dreamed about."

Alan's own smile had vanished and he was now looking back and forth from one cop to the other. The one named Joe was not looking incredulous as Alan would have hoped. He was becoming as excited as his partner. That's when Joe looked back down to him and said, "What about him?"

"Well, we can't let him go, can we?" said the first cop, his eyes gleaming as the stared down at tiny Alan.
1531.title: Alan can trust the cops... Not!

Tom says he wants me in HIS sock
15311.content:
Ricco, had Alan in hand and was reaching for his sock. Alan was horrified.

"NO PLEASE DONT DO THIS" Alan shouted as he was dangled over the opening.

Tom, the other officer just watched with some amusement and said. "Your gonna put him in there ? The poor bastard doesnt stand a chance.
You'll squish him for sure."

"Your right, huumm. Cant have that. We might wanna play with him later. See if theres anything in that book."

Tom leafed thru the book looking for something to alter my current state. I wiggled and thrashed about in Ricco's huge sweaty hand.

"Here we go, place him in this circle in the book" Tom told Ricco.

Fearing I may try to run or escape, which I would have, Tried to anyway, Ricco pulled a loose string from his sock and used it to "hog tie me. Bound to his satisfaction, I was placed in the circle, imprinted in the book. Tom then read the incantation on the alternate page aloud.

"Change this form"
"Malleable be"
"Crushable, pliable"
"Able to flattne thee'

I felt a stange tingling sensation then Tom pointed his finger and brought it close to me.

"Well lets see if this worked"

Still tied up he took his thick meaty finger and pressed it down onto me, then harder. I felt the pressure, then more pressure but no pain. I then realized his finger hand pressed into me so far that I was paper thin under his finger tip. HE flattend my stomach flat !

Both looking in amazement. He then pit his thumb right over my face. I screamed as he pressed down. My yells were muffeled under his pressure. I looked like a cartoon character.

Both men laughted.

"Great it worked ! this is going to be alot of fun, well atleast for us, this guy is gonna just be wishing he was squashed like a bug though. HAHAHAHA"

I was then picked up again, unleased and dropped into the deapths of the still sweaty sock.

Ricco was getting a big kick out of knowing a little helpless guy was going to spend the next few hours under this hot smelly feet.

Dropped down into the white athletic sock Riccos foot quickly came into view. His long toes wiggling. I could see that his nails were in desperate need of a trimming. I saw them pointed down towards me.

I could hear Officer Tom far above.

He said, “This is soooo cool. Just thing of all the scum bags you would like to squash like bugs under your boot. Sure would save the tax payers a lot of money on jailing them.”

The boot was laced up and they headed……

He describes the feeling to Tom.

Alan is not physically hurt in his atered form. Unless of course you count his injured pride. He was being turned into living toe jam.

Ricco and Alan started walking their beet again. Alan was stuck in the nasty smelly sock for hours. At times its almost like Ricco forgot Alan was even there.

They finished their shifts without ever checking on him. Back in the lockerroom at the station the partners undress and decide to shower. Ricco starts by pulling off his boots. He sets them down on the floor just as Tom was bending down.

Tom got a nose full os his boot stench. "Damn, thats nasty." he said. "That little guys gotta be dead in that sock"

"Shhhhhhhh" Ricco said. "Someone might hear you." He then got down to his socks. First he pulled off his left sock, rolled it up in a ball and tossed it into his locker. He then pulled off his right sock and sees Alan wedged inbetween his moist smelly toes.

He....
1531111.title: Back to work

choices: Ricco continues to the gym...
Ricco decides to head on home, it's been too long a day...
15311111.content:
Ricco and Tom laughed hard as they watched poor Alan attempt to regain his form from between Ricco's toes. Ricco then pulled him out and put him back in the rank sock, placing it in his boot so Alan couldn't escape.

"Come on Tom, let's hit the showers."

The two officers finished disrobing and cleaned up, both of them thinking about the poor kid trapped in that sock. Meanwhile, Alan, who had been slowly reforming, had just about been broken by the experience. Looking around depressively in the darkness and stench of Ricco's sock, "They... they didn't even want to help me. I'm just a thing to them..." He raised his newly formed hand to wipe a tear from his eye, "Why won't they just help me?"

Alan's thoughts, however, were jarred away suddenly as a burst of light hit him, having not noticed the sounds of the locker opening. Ricco's face peered in over the entrance after checking to make sure the coast was clear, "So. Tom and I have been talking and we figure punks like you should be made into an example. Since this isn't supposed to be a good thing for you, and I have the smelliest feet, Tom agreed I should keep you for a while. Therefore, I'll be your judge and jury. I sentence you to a year of being my personal insole and toe-toy. If you try to escape under any circumstances, your sentence will increase by one year for every attempt. I hope you liked being my toe-jam during my beat today, because that's what it's going to be like everyday, bug." Tom and Ricco laughed again, and poor Alan simply sat there in the sock, staring up in disbelief at the two officers.

Alan finally spoke up, tears nearly in his eyes, "But... why? I didn't do anything wrong. I just wanted to try out shrinking a little. You... you can't do this!" He wiped away a tear, "I'm still a person!"

Ricco grinned and raised Alan up to his face, "No. You're not now. You're just a little, pliable toy that can talk. Luckily for me though, you can talk much in my sock." To drive the point home, Ricco balled his hand around Alan, forcing him into a ball-like state, loosing his ability to talk back, "See? You're just a thing."

Tom laughed at this, leaning over to Ricco, "You know... we haven't been ot the gym in a while. I know we just took showers, but I'm sure you wouldn't mind starting the poor thing's service. What do you say?"

Ricco's eyes met Tom's and he grinned an evil grin, "Why the hell not. It'll help our rightful prisoner find his place at my toes, haha." And despite being balled up, Alan's senses worked fine. He could see the looks on both of their faces as Ricco looked back down at him, "Yeah little thing. You can be my jam again tonight while I work out." If he'd had a face, Alan would've looked horrified. There was little time for Alan to react before Ricco tossed him back in the sock. He continued getting dressed, pulling his workout clothes from his locker and slipping them on, moving his wallet, keys, and such into the sweatpants. He then pulled a pair of black Puma running shoes out and set them on the ground. Ricco grabbed the sock and slide his right foot in, trapping Alan again as Ricco positioned Alan under his toes again, pressing down hard.

Alan's prison was already hot again, and he could hear Ricco laughing at him again with Tom over his 'sentence.' He was infuriated, but there was little he could do as Ricco's weight forced his body between the toes. His senses were overwhelmed with the smell, feel, and taste of Ricco's size 14 foot. Before sliding on the shoe, Ricco crossed his leg and leaned in so Alan could hear him clearly, "Now, this day won't count against your time served since this was initiation. I hope you like how my feet taste and smell, because like I said, you'll be my living toe jam for the next year. That'll teach you to mess with things you shouldn't."

Ricco then slide on the shoe, grinding his toes into the ground and smiling at the raw power of feeling poor Alan oozing around his toes. He turned to Tom and smiled, "You know... I know you kinda 'gave' him to me, but you should get one of these too. I can't tell you how powerful you feel under your foot." Tom laughed and agreed, patting Ricco on the back as they headed out of the locker room to their respective cars.

If he could've cried in his form, he would've. He'd lost all sembalance of form under Ricco's toes, unable to stop the sweat from getting in his mouth, forced to drink it as fast as it came, even the formed lint with it. He was saturated with the smell, wondering if he'd ever smell normal or even remotely clean again. He didn't have much time to think between Ricco's steps, the officer making a special effort to make Alan ooze around with each step. At this point, he covered inbetween all of Ricco's toes, the rest of his body sliding under the sole.

Ricco got to his car and started it up, grinning wildly again as he put the gear selector into reverse, looking in his mirrors as he started out of the parking space.
15311111.title: Rolls him into his sock for later

choices: Ricco looks around and finds the right machine
Weighing the choices, he's still tired from earlier and calls it there.
153111111.content:
Ricco pulled up to the gym, parking and quickly getting out. He flashed his membership card to the doorman and quickly headed over to the treadmills, eager to really feel Alan under his toes again.

Alan was already beginning to break from the experience. It was pretty obvious to him that he wasn't getting out of this predicament easily, if at all. He'd already started, willingly to lick up the jam and sweat, rationalizing to himself that it would be the only 'food' he might get while in there. Just as he started to think that things couldn't get any worse... they did.

Ricco immediately set the machine for 15mph and started on a 5 mile run. He let himself relax and braced his arms on the side rails of the machine, letting his mind wonder off as he watched the tv. Running had always relaxed him before, but the feeling of Alan in his sock was, for him, one of the most relaxing thigns ever, among other feelings at the moment. For Alan though, it was starting to turn into a literal hell. Ricco's shoes weren't well ventilated at all, and as the workout continued, the heat stayed put, causing Ricco's feet to sweat much, much more than earlier during the beat. Alan was literally inundated with sweat as the heat continued to bake him in that sock. He tried his best not to think about wht was happening to him, to remember even earlier today before he shrank... but he had little success as the sweat and heat continued to build up. His poor, little body beginning to absorb the sweat like the good little insole and jam that he is. Alan felt like crying again, but it would've been useless. His 'eyes' were already covered in sweat and it couldn't have been noticed, not that he ever would be in Ricco's sock.

Ricco continued his workout, feeling a charge he'd never felt before as his run came to an end. He hopped off the machine and leaned in on his knees, catching his breath a moment while curling his toes, chuckling slightly as Alan's form oozed around again. He took a swing from his waterbottle and looked around the gym, hoping to find something else to torture Alan with. After all, this was 'prison time,' not a vacation.
153111111.title: Ricco continues to the gym...

choices: The next morning
1531111112.content:
After Ricco returned from the gym, he peeled off his shoes and socks, running a finger along his foot to find and then peel Alan off. He looked down and the malformed man with a grin, "You look good down there, comfy too. You're doing your city proud by helping out with the local police force. You may be a worthless little punk, but you're still making up for it." He chuckles and finishes peeling Alan out from between his toes, watching the poor kid stretch a little before he snaps back to himself.

Alan was excited though, his torture was done for the evening it seemed. He 'laid' there in half-fear, half-relaxation as Ricco stared him down, watching Alan start to reform into his old self. Alan was just happy that he was out of Ricco's sock, able to breathe fresh air despite the fact he still positively reeked of Ricco's footsweat.

Ricco huffed, annoyed slightly that Alan wasn't trying to beg for mercy, somewhat unaware that Alan was simply happy only because he was out from between Ricco's toes. "You know, in prison, inmates don't really get much freedom or time. I'm pretty tired from work and the gym, so tonight I'll just tie you up in the sock. I might find a more creative place for you later, but that's where you'll stay tonight."

Alan sighed, a little broken already by the experience. He simply bowed his head and waited to be picked up; Alan knew there was little point in struggling given his two-inch height. He actually managed a chuckle though, given the irony of 'height', seeing as he was more flat than tall now.

Ricco grabbed Alan and slipped him down the sock, tying off the end and slipping it into the gym-shoes he used earlier. he sighed in content and laid back on his bed, picking up the phone to call Tom, eager to let him know about the experience. Alan could barely make out the conversation, but it lasted quite a while. Alan's poor, little heart sunk when Ricco got to a certain point in the conversation, "Nah man, he's mine. I don't plan on ever letting the kid go. It's not like there's any evidence... the park was empty and I have the book with me. ... Sure, you can borrow it. We'll have to find someone for you too. My little toe-jam can serve his new life sentence for playing with things he shouldn't have, yours can... hmm. He can be brought in for questioning... that will never end! Haha! Hm? Yeah. I'll wear him tomorrow too. I wasn't joking man, I plan to keep him as my living toe jam. It feels so good having him down there..." The conversation droned on for a while longer, but Alan stopped listening. He laid down as best he could, sighing, nearly in tears again as he contemplated what exactly Ricco meant. His life was over; he couldn't go back. Would anyone miss him? Would anyone find him? Would Ricco ever let him go? He took a deep breath, already somewhat used to Ricco's footsmell, and slowly began to doze off. Sleep was the only thing that could keep his mind off of this.
1531111112.title: Weighing the choices, he's still tired from...

choices: Ricco heads to the mall.
Ricco stops for some coffee beforehand
15311111121.content:
Alan woke up with sunshine in his eyes. He jumped up in shock, looking around in amazement as he saw normal-sized trees, plants, people... everything! He smiled and ran up to one of the people, greeting them, asking the time. He figured he'd simply passed out and only just now woke up. The blurry-faced person looked at Alan and murmured something uncomprehensible, and Alan was confused. He asked again, but receieved the same, jumbled response. Alan looked around... everything else seemed normal, what was wrong with this one person?

Everything. Everything was wrong with him. Alan screamed and woke himself up in the process. He jumped up and tried to look around in the darkness, taking a few moments to realize he was still tied up in Ricco's sock. "It... it was a dream. I... but... it was so real..." Alan trailed off. He felt a rumble and began to see some light as Ricco opened the sock back up, "Morning jam. Time for day two." Alan only saw Ricco's face for a moment before the long, now trimmed, toes started to block out the light. Ricco pulled the sock on tight before finishing getting dressed, taking his time to feel Alan oozing around between his toes, sock, and the cold, hardwood floor.

Ricco found his boots and crossed his right leg over, speaking to the sock, "So, I hope you're growing to like my feet. I mean, I know they're everything a foot guy would want - size 14, long toes, slender sole, smell kinda strong. Even if you don't, like I said yesterday, you're mine to keep. You better do a good job today keeping my toes comfy and drinking up my sweat. If I'm not happy at the end of the day, I may just keep you on as a perma-insole. After all, all justice systems allow for extensions of incarceration." He laughed hard and started to slide his foot in the boot, stomping the sole on the ground before lacing it up tight.

Alan listened and sighed. After yesterday's humiliation, he was already quite a bit broken. The tears weren't there, the panic was going away. All he was starting to know was darkness, heat, and Ricco's feet. He was almost getting used to this, almost enjoying it. Yes, Alan did have a foot fetish, but this experience, so suddenly, was too much at once. He did his best to catch his thoughts up as Ricco began walking to work. His poor little body once again sliding up and in between Ricco's toes, absorbing the sweat. His mind was filled with the thoughts of last night, but with a new one - What if... if I grow to like this?

Ricco arrived at the station, his feet sweating profusely. He wiggled his toes and grined as he felt Alan moving around his right toes. He began to think to himself, "Ah. That little kid makes such a good little sweat absorber. I'm never going to let him go." He opened the door and walked up to the desk, smiling at the secretary before grabbing his assignment for the day, 'Beat patrol at the mall.' "Oh man," Ricco thought to himself, "Eight hours of that? Fuck. At least my living toe jam will help me suffer through it." He grabbed the keys to a cruiser and started to get into the patrol car, sighing, "God I hope this doesn't suck too much."

154.content:
In comparison with his suddenly enormous surroundings, Alan figured he was only about three or four inches tall.

The sidewalk resembles a huge plaza. Blades of grass form a jungle of towering plants three times his size.

"Cool!" Alan said. "The spell really worked."

He runs his hands all over his body. He still feels very much the same, as if only his surroundings have changed. He tingles with excitement.

Of course, he should have studied the reversal spell before shrinking himself.

No matter. He need only reach the book...

But when he walks up to one of the smooth legs supporting the park bench, he realizes getting back to the book is not going to be easy.

The bench towers some 40 feet over Alan's head.

Suddenly, he hears a grinding noise and sees two giants on skateboards coming along the sidewalk toward his bench. They brake their boards and the grating noise of the wheels against the concrete is almost deafening.

They dismount from the boards and walk toward the bench. Alan cowers behind one of the massive legs supporting the bench.

The two guys are so awesome and huge. They wear baggy clothes. Their shorts sway almost off their hips. Their huge sneakers dominate Alan's vision.

"Wow...look at this book!" Through the spaces in the bench, Alan watches one of the giants, a dude with spiky blond hair, pick up the book.

"It looks like it's some sort of magic book. This looks like a spell."

Alan is faced with a dilemma. Should he reveal himself to the giants and ask for their help? Or wait and hope they leave without carrying off his book?

1541.content:
"Can you read it, Taylor?" The other giant skater asks his friend holding the book.

"Not sure, Jake. Looks like it's in some really ancient language or something."

Alan cringes, his back against the huge leg supporting the bench. The huge sneakers the giants are wearing look quite formidable to the tiny 18-year-old.

These guys are about his same age, but they're in a league of their own when it comes to size. Alan cannot believe that anything could be so huge. He's finally getting to experience what it is like to be tiny and cowering in the shadow of giants. He is filled with both elation and pure adrenaline-pumping terror.

Alan takes a deep breath and steps from beneath the bench. He stands between the two enormous pairs of sneakers.

"Hey! Down here!" Alan screams. "Guys! Help!"

"Hey! Look down there!" Jake shouts.

Alan squeals in fright as a huge hand descends toward him. "No. Don't crush me!"

"It's a little man!" Jake exclaims as his fingers wrap around you.

Alan feels like he is caught in a crushing vise. "Please, be careful."
